item.title: Operator splitting
item.description: I stumbled across the recent paper “Efficient Reactive Brownian Dynamics”, which proposes a reaction-diffusion scheme based on a technique called Strang splitting. While I was vaguely familiar with the notion of splitting, I wanted to write up this post to think out some of the details I hadn’t previously. The reaction-diffusion scheme is a perfect context to understand splitting because there are effectively two (coupled, but distinct) dynamics going on: diffusion and reactions.
